content:
ITEM NO.12                 COURT NO.11                 SECTION IV-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No. 2276/2024
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated 04-04-2022
in RSA No. 100076/2018 passed by the High Court of Karnataka
Circuit Bench at Dharwad]
AKKAMMA & ORS.                                     Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
BHADRAVVA @ RATNAVVA & ORS.                        Respondent(s)
(IA No. 147266/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING, IA No.
147268/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN REFILING /  CURING THE
DEFECTS and IA No. 147267/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.)
 
Date : 01-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE M.M. SUNDRESH
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. VINOD CHANDRAN
(PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Petitioner(s) : 
                   Mr. Puneet Jain, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Ashwin V. Kotemath, Adv.
                   Mr. M.R. Hiremathad, Adv.
                   Mr. Harisha S.R., AOR                   
For Respondent(s) : 
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Application for exemption from filing official translation of
Annexures P-1 to P-4 is allowed.
Issue notice on the application for condonation of delay as
well as on the Special Leave Petition.
Till the next date of hearing, there shall be stay on the
passing of the final decree alone.  Thus, other proceedings shall
go on.
(DEEPAK GUGLANI)                                 (POONAM VAID)
   AR-cum-PS                               ASSISTANT REGISTRAR
